      • listAllGroups

        public void listAllGroups()
        List all groups uses Controller.listAllGroups()

      • createNewGroup

        public void createNewGroup()
        Method that will ask user the needed data for creating a new group. We will comprove that a group with the given id doesn't exists. If it does, we will show error. If it doesn't, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use model for creating the new group. uses Controller.createNewGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Group)

      • modifyGroup

        public void modifyGroup()
        Method that will ask user the id of the group to modify. If the group exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use the model for modifying the group. uses Controller.modifyGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Group)

      • deleteGroup

        public void deleteGroup()
        Method that will ask user the id of the group to delete. If the group exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use the model for removing the group. uses Controller.deleteGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Group)

      • listAllStudents

        public void listAllStudents()
        List all students uses Controller.listAllStudents()

      • listAllStudentsInAGroup

        public void listAllStudentsInAGroup()
        Method that will ask user the id of the group to show(its students). If a group with the given id exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use the model for modifying the student. uses Controller.listAllStudentsInAGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Group)

      • createNewStudent

        public void createNewStudent()
        Method that will ask user the needed data for creating a new student. We will comprove that a student with the given id doesn't exists. If it does, we will show error, if it doesn't, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use model for creating the new student. uses Controller.createNewStudent(bdmvcschool.model.Student)

      • modifyStudent

        public void modifyStudent()
        Method that will ask user the id of the student to modify. If the student exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use the model for modifying the student. uses Controller.modifyStudent(bdmvcschool.model.Student)

      • deleteStudent

        public void deleteStudent()
        Method that will ask user the id of the student to delete. If the student exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use the model for removing the student. uses Controller.deleteStudent(bdmvcschool.model.Student)

      • enrollStudentInGroup

        public void enrollStudentInGroup()
        Method that will ask user the id of the student to enroll into a group. If the student exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use model for enrolling the student to the group. uses Controller.enrollStudentInGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Student, bdmvcschool.model.Group)

      • unEnrollStudentInGroup

        public void unEnrollStudentInGroup()
        Method that will ask user the id of the student to unenroll from a group. If the student exists, we will show it. If not, we will show error message. We will ask for user for confirmation. If confirm, we will send the data to the controller. Which will use model for unenrolling the student to the group. uses Controller.unEnrollStudentInGroup(bdmvcschool.model.Student, bdmvcschool.model.Group)
